Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ activities out of all review-related activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Number of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ activities that lead to \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' occurs

Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ followed by \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Percentage of manuscripts that proceed to \SW-Awaiting EIC Decision\ after a \SW-Reviewer Agreed\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ in successful review cycles (ending in \SW-EIC Accept\ or \RW-EIC Accept\)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ in variants leading to \SW-EIC Major Revision\ or \SW-EIC Minor Revision\
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ activities by different performers
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ activities that are followed by \SW-AE Assign Reviewers\ within the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ in relation to total activities in the longest variant paths
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ followed by \SW-Reviewer Declined\ (to measure reconsideration or errors)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Number of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ activities that precede \Manuscript Export Succeeded\ (to measure impact on manuscript processing speed)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ activities out of all activities in the review process (to understand its weight in the process)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Number of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ activities that are followed by \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1\ or \Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2\ (to measure follow-up reminders)
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' occurs

Name: Percentage of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ in cases with more than one round of review (to understand its role in prolonged review processes)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases where '' does not happen

Name: Frequency of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ before and after \SW-Checklist Completed\ (to measure its timing in the review checklist completion process)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Number of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ activities per case
Number of \SW-Reviewer Agreed\ activities grouped by month
